attributes.action: Bonus on tax return for all NHS staff and care workers
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the Government or Parliament to help these NHS staff out while times are hard for everyone they are working all these house to help everyone else so please help them with a little bonus on there tax return 

Thank you
attributes.background: To show there appreciation to all the NHS for all there hard work while most of the uk is isolated.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303306

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
